description: Order fulfillment scenario permutations to challenge autonomous agents

permutations.name: Baseline
permutations.description: Single case, standard timeout. Validates basic agent coordination.

permutations.name: Rapid
permutations.description: Single case, short timeout. Challenges agent responsiveness.

permutations.name: Concurrent 2
permutations.description: Two cases launched in parallel. Challenges agent contention and throughput.

permutations.name: Concurrent 3
permutations.description: Three cases in parallel. Stress test for multi-case handling.

permutations.name: Sequential 3
permutations.description: Three cases launched one after another. Challenges sustained throughput.

permutations.name: Back-to-Back
permutations.description: Two cases with minimal pause. Challenges agent recovery between cases.
